description: This file defines a React component named 'Favorites' that displays the current user's favorite recipes. It manages fetching the favorite recipes from an API, displaying a loading indicator, rendering recipe cards, and handling toggling of favorite status.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches the user's favorite recipes from the API and updates the component state.

methods.name: handleToggle
methods.description: Handles toggling of the favorite status for a recipe by sending a delete request and updating the local recipes state.
